name: The RepAIr Shop (EliteAnorak)
description:
You've been hired at the rep~AI~r Shop. But not as a repair man, as a trainer. Your job is to help the auto-repair ai program better recognize how to repair the ships by correcting the ai's mistakes. 

This was created in a weekend for the WOWIE 4.0 game jam. The theme was "Collaborating with AI"
